Package com.example.inventorypro

Class TagList

java.lang.Object
com.example.inventorypro.SynchronizedList<String>
com.example.inventorypro.TagList
public class TagList extends SynchronizedList<String>
A type of synchronized list (uses singleton pattern). Represents the list of tags defined by the user and synced with the database.

    • hookSelectItems

      public void hookSelectItems(android.content.Context context, android.widget.ListView itemListView, @Nullable ArrayList<Item> items, @Nullable List<String> tags)
      This hook is for using the select tags array adapter rather than the create tags array adapter
      Parameters:
      context - the context
      itemListView - the list view to attach the array adapter to
      items - the ArrayList of items that tags are being selected for
      tags - the List of tags to select (this is for adding and editing items)
